Content.Name: Presentation
Content.Title: Pathway Presentation
Content.Abstract: Presentation for Pathway firesides and events
Content.BodyCopy:
The Pathway Home Office has developed several presentation options for Pathway missionaries to use when informing potential students and/or local Church leaders about the program. Each type of presentation is intended for a different audience, and instructions are provided below regarding which presentation to use for which audience. (Please do not use any presentation created by you or another missionary -- only use those created by Pathway.)

STEP 1: Download the Pathway Presentation
Choose the presentation you would like to download from the chart below. The folder you download will contain four items: 1) The Presentation, 2) Talking Points, and 3) a Handout, and 4) an Interest List template. Please print and review the talking points several times before giving a presentation.

20-Minute Presentation
3RD-HOUR SUNDAY MEETINGS
FIRESIDES

10-Minute Presentation
WARD COUNCILS
PRIESTHOOD LEADER MEETINGS

5-Minute Presentation
OPENING EXERCISES
OTHER MEETINGS

Standard Presentation Standard Presentation Presentation
Standard & ESL Combined Presentation* Standard & ESL Combined Presentation*

*The Standard & ESL Combined Presentation should only be used in areas with established Pathway ESL programs.

STEP 2: Test the Presentation
After you have downloaded the presentation, check to see if the audio and videos play properly. If the videos do not work, you will need to do the following:

  • Download Apple Quicktime for free: www.apple.com/quicktime/download.
  • Make Apple Quicktime your default video player. For instructions on how to do this, watch this tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ueyQBMv08eM
  • Restart your computer after completing the two steps above. Then test the presentation again; everything should now operate properly. (If you still have issues playing the videos, use the presentation as-is, and skip the videos when you get to those slides.)

Also, if the Talking Points document does not open, you will need to download Adobe Reader for free: http://get.adobe.com/reader/

________________________________________________

Additional Information:

Specifications 
These presentations have been created using Microsoft PowerPoint. In order for the presentation to function properly, you must have the following installed on your computer: PowerPoint for Windows 2007 or newer, or PowerPoint for Mac 2008 or newer.

Audio/Video
These presentations contain audio and video clips on several slides. These clips are embedded in the presentations and will play when the slide is clicked a second time.  

Help
If you experience any technical issues with the PowerPoints, please contact your Pathway regional manager, or call (208) 496-1820 to be directed to the correct individual.
